casebody.data:
William G. LARSEN and Robert Stephen Allen
v.
The ARLINGTON CONDOMINIUM OWNERS ASSOCIATION, INC. and Arlington Residential Holdings, LLC No. 49P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 Patrick H. Flanagan, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Jaye E. Bingham-Hinch, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for The Arlington Condominium Owners Association, Inc. David G. Redding, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Joseph R. Pellington, Attorney at Law, for Larsen, William G., et al. Kenneth R. Raynor, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Arlington Residential Holdings, LLC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 3rd of February 2017 by Defendant (The Arlington Condominium Owners Association, Inc.) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."
